result.execSummary:
All charges against Bryan Edward Anderson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Bryan Edward Anderson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bryan Edward Anderson

defendant.name: Anderson, Bryan Edward
defendant.address: 319 West Fifth Street, New Richmond, WI 54017

records.addlTxt: INIT event created for purposes of disposition.  gll

11:01 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jon Elton Stanek in court for Bryan Edward Anderson. Defendant Bryan Edward Anderson appeared by video, in custody at Houston County Jail. Includes 21CF391, 21CF455- FPT, and 22CM432- INIT. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Ct 1: Theft- Movable Property 943.20(1)(a) in 21CF391 and Guilty to Ct. 4: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent- 943.23(3) in 21CF391. DE sworn. Court reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Court accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 and 4 in 21CF391. On motion of the State without objection, Court dismisses Ct 2,3,5 in 21CF391, 21CF455, and 22CM432. Sentencing arguments. 


Court Orders:

21CF391 Count 1: W/S 3 Years Probation; Concurrent to 21CF391 Count 4

- 90 days conditional jail- Stayed
- Court Costs: $268.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
- DNA Surcharge: $250.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
- DNA Sample
- Restitution: $9,093.00. Payable to J.O. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation

21CF391 Count 4: W/S 3 Years Probation; Concurrent to 21CF391 Count 1

- 90 days conditional jail- Stayed
- Court Costs: $268.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
- DNA Surcharge: $250.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
- DNA Sample


Conditions of Probation:

- AODA and follow through 
- Test randomly and regularly 
- Absolute sobriety
- No Contact with J.O., A.L., and T.P.
- Sign up for probation 


Adjourned at 11:17 AM
